import React from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import './Calendar.css'; function CalendarAddPop(){ let defaultProps = { calTitle :'일정등록', calConfirmBtn : '확인', calScheduleTitle :'일정명', startDateTitle : '시작', endDateTitle :'종료', attendenceTitle :'참석자' , display :'false' } return(
X
{this.props.calTitle}
{this.props.calConfirmBtn}
{this.props.calScheduleTitle}
{this.props.startDateTitle}
{this.props.endDateTitle}
{this.props.attendenceTitle}
) } export default CalendarAddPop;
